title: Sun-Kissed Mission Beach Tropical Escape with A$100 Resort Credit
description:
Connect with nature during a blissful stay at Castaways Resort & Spa Mission Beach - a tropical resort flanked by verdant rainforests on one side and a 14km stretch of pristine beachfront on the other. Hidden between Townsville and Cairns, this sun-kissed haven is a quiet refuge that's perfectly placed for relaxation and discovering the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest.

The adventurous can take their pick of water-based adventures, while those who want to relax and unwind will have no trouble finding a patch of white sand to soak up some rays. The sheer diversity makes Castaways Resort & Spa Mission Beach the perfect destination for couples, families with children or groups of friends. When you need a break from exploring the magical sights, be sure to take a moment to enjoy the resort's onsite facilities, including two swimming pools, the luxurious Drift Day Spa (featuring three treatment rooms and a relaxed reception lounge), BUKO restaurant, a tours and activities desk, and fitness centre.
offer_address: 2 Pacific Parade, Mission Beach, Queensland 4852, Australia

title: Sun-Kissed Mission Beach Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Connect with nature in a place that feels quite unlike anywhere else with a blissful stay at Castaways Resort & Spa Mission Beach - a tropical resort flanked by verdant rainforests on one side and a 14km stretch of pristine beachfront on the other. Hidden between Townsville and Cairns, this sun-kissed haven is a quiet refuge that's perfectly placed for relaxation and discovering the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest.

The adventurous can take their pick of water-based adventures while those who want to relax and unwind will have no trouble finding a patch of white sand to soak up some rays, making Castaways Resort & Spa Mission Beach the perfect destination for couples, families with children or groups of friends. When you need a break from exploring the magical sights, be sure to take a moment to enjoy the resort's onsite facilities, including two swimming pools, the luxurious Drift Day Spa (featuring three treatment rooms and a relaxed reception lounge), BUKO restaurant, a tours and activities desk, and fitness centre.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Sumptuous daily breakfast spread at BUKO
- Make the most of every minute in paradise and enjoy guaranteed 11am late checkout
- Complimentary parking for one vehicle throughout your stay
- Post your dreamy holiday snaps thanks to free Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Beachfront Family Resort Room and enjoy more space to move with two bedrooms for up to four guests of any age.
offer_address: 2 Pacific Parade, Mission Beach, Queensland 4852, Australia

title: Tropical Beachside Escape in Mission Beach
description: Unwind amidst the sunny splendour of Mission Beach in far-north Queensland, staying at the beachfront Castaways Resort & Spa - the perfect base for exploring the Great Barrier Reef and the World Heritage-listed rainforest. title: Absolute Beachfront Escape in Tropical Queensland

title: Beachfront Mission Beach Escape
description:
Plunge into coastal cool at the enviably located Castaways Resort & Spa Mission Beach, a tropical oasis situated on a 14-kilometre stretch of pristine beachfront. 

Hidden on Mission Beach, overlooking the glistening Coral Sea from the beachfront infinity pool, this palm-fringed resort is your springboard to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef and ancient Daintree Rainforest.
offer_address: 2 Pacific Parade, Mission Beach, Queensland 4852, Australia

title: Tropical Mission Beach Escape Two Hours from Cairns with Two Swimming Pools
description:
Unwind amid the sunny splendour of Mission Beach, Tropical North Queensland, at Castaways Resort & Spa - a tropical oasis situated directly on a 14-kilometre stretch of palm-fringed, sandy white beachfront. Located two hours from Cairns and three hours from Townsville, Castaways Resort & Spa offers easy access to the nearby Great Barrier Reef and the sprawling Daintree Rainforest, while granting spectacular, uninterrupted views of Dunk Island and the Coral Sea. Twenty tranquil tropical islands are located just offshore and there's a secret rainforest swimming area only five minutes away.

Enjoy Castaways Resort & Spaâ€™s convenient onsite facilities, including two swimming pools, the luxurious Drift Day Spa (featuring three treatment rooms and a relaxed reception lounge), BUKO restaurant, a tours and activities desk, and fitness centre. The adventurous can take their pick of extreme sports, including skydiving, while those who want to relax and unwind will have no trouble finding a patch of pillowy white sand to soak up some rays.
offer_address: 2 Pacific Parade, Mission Beach, Queensland 4852, Australia
